Still at the Riu Palace Punta Cana in the middle of a 2 week holiday the bedroom smells of stale urine the paint is coming off the walls the fan is noisy the air con makes a tap dripping noise and the view is of a building site
There was a musty smell from the air conditioning unit which began to leak on the floor on our last night
I booked the best most expensive romupon arrival we found the tv cable was frayed and the tv did not work

1: Rooms were nicely renovated and super clean the bathroom was nicely set up
Phenomenal service provided by all staff food especially polside snacks and cappuccino bar nightly shows excursions and room acomodations
Great staff service room food just a terrific place

Overall very nice place right on a good beach very helpful and accommodating staff did n’t like that all 3 pools close at 630pm they should at least keep the small one open you can go to the hotel next door that has 24 hours pool our bathroom was not properly clean and the toilet clogged twice first time it took 15 hours for someone to come and fix it
Wi Fi is very fast and reliable at the resort even on the beachTip request a room near the elevator as there is only one for each wing
She replied that room selections were done upon check in
Food was consistent and rooms very clean
Love the place beautiful views and friendly staff good service
Food was excellent lots of shade on the beach and at the pools bar service was very prompt entertainment was good rooms were very clean and lots of hot water
Our maid kept our room clean and tidy surprised us with a new piece of towel art every day
